txt.en: You've just become Proficient in a craft skill.  You can now use recipes of the next Tier, and you can work toward mastering the Tier that you are now Proficient in!  Note that you must Master all previous Tiers before Mastering a new tier.

You've just become Proficient in a craft skill. You can now use recipes of the next Tier, and you can work toward mastering the Tier in which you are now Proficient! Note that you must Master all previous Tiers before Mastering a new tier.
